title: 旧约 - 约拿书(Jonah) - 第 2 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约拿书(Jonah) -- 第 2 章 ( 本篇共有 4 章 )

lineList.en: Then Jonah prayed unto the LORD his God out of the fish's belly,
lineList.cn: 约拿在鱼腹中祷告耶和华他的神，

lineList.en: And said, I cried by reason of mine affliction unto the LORD, and he heard me; out of the belly of hell cried I, and thou heardest my voice.
lineList.cn: 说，我遭遇患难求告耶和华，你就应允我。从阴间的深处呼求，你就俯听我的声音。

lineList.en: For thou hadst cast me into the deep, in the midst of the seas; and the floods compassed me about: all thy billows and thy waves passed over me.
lineList.cn: 你将我投下深渊，就是海的深处。大水环绕我。你的波浪洪涛都漫过我身。

lineList.en: Then I said, I am cast out of thy sight; yet I will look again toward thy holy temple.
lineList.cn: 我说，我从你眼前虽被驱逐，我仍要仰望你的圣殿。

lineList.en: The waters compassed me about, even to the soul: the depth closed me round about, the weeds were wrapped about my head.
lineList.cn: 诸水环绕我，几乎淹没我。深渊围住我，海草缠绕我的头。

lineList.en: I went down to the bottoms of the mountains; the earth with her bars was about me for ever: yet hast thou brought up my life from corruption, O LORD my God.
lineList.cn: 我下到山根。地的门将我永远关住。耶和华我的神阿，你却将我的性命，从坑中救出来。

lineList.en: When my soul fainted within me I remembered the LORD: and my prayer came in unto thee, into thine holy temple.
lineList.cn: 我心在我里面发昏的时候，我就想念耶和华。我的祷告进入你的圣殿，达到你的面前。

lineList.en: They that observe lying vanities forsake their own mercy.
lineList.cn: 那信奉虚无之神的人，离弃怜爱他们的主。

lineList.en: But I will sacrifice unto thee with the voice of thanksgiving; I will pay that that I have vowed. Salvation is of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 但我必用感谢的声音献祭与你。我所许的愿，我必偿还。救恩出于耶和华。

lineList.en: And the LORD spake unto the fish, and it vomited out Jonah upon the dry land.
lineList.cn: 耶和华吩咐鱼，鱼就把约拿吐在旱地上。
